name: Spellty
description: Spellty is a Delaware-based startup founded in 2020 that builds communication and automation solutions on top of Metaâ€™s infrastructure. The company offers services for large-scale messaging and digital campaigns, customer service platforms with multi-agent support and chatbots, and a flexible messaging API for seamless integration with enterprise systems. It also provides secure multi-channel OTP authentication and a flow builder that enables businesses to design personalized conversational experiences without the need for coding.
